services.title: Electro Mechanical Works (HVAC)
services.description: We have expert teams in all electro mechanical work. We have experienced engineers, foremen & technicians for the mechanical work in HVAC, fire fighting & electrical works.
services.detailedDescription: All related work for installation of chillers, air handling units, exhaust fans, blowers, fresh air fans, ducting with insulation, & chill water piping with insulation & cladding, fire fighting pumps, fire fighting networks water transfer pumps, sewage pumps etc..
services.domainExpertise: Mohammed Abdul Hamid Al-Bishri Company Electro Mechanical Est. understands the dynamics and intricacies of different Industries and has the expertise to provide optimal solutions for industry specific requirements.
services: All airconditioning and refrigeration systems maintenance
Chill water piping with insulation & cladding

services.title: Energy Saving Solutions Electrical Works
services.description: Energy costs are on the rise, and facilities everywhere are looking to reduce energy consumption and the costs related to it.
services.detailedDescription: We provide industrial energy savers. Mohammed Abdul Hamid Al-Bishri Company provides a complete turn-key energy conservation solution for corporations. Our extensive product line of energy saving products provides your corporation with a payback of 1 to 3 years ensuring an excellent return on investment.
keyBenefits: High quality products and outstanding support
Saving is 3 times cheaper than Generation of Electricity

services.title: Fiber Cable Pulling Work
services.description: According to many experienced cable installers, fail to pull cable properly will eventually lead to a series of network problems and disasters.
services.detailedDescription: Since installing cable is a routine yet fundamental task, its importance thus cannot be underestimated. Therefore, to ensure a smooth and efficient cable pulling process, installers should get fully prepared for the work, and take various factors into consideration to avoid damaging the cable.

services.title: Electro Works
services.description: We provide supply and installation of transformers, transmission lines and termination, lighting and small power systems, lower current systems, among others
services.detailedDescription: Lighting and small power systems that includes channeling and wiring, cabling and termination, main distribution frames (MDF), power factor correction capacitor banks including generator and ATS panel. Low current systems that includes channeling and wiring for CCTV, access control, gate barrier, structured cabling, lighting control, intercom, SMATV/MATV, PABGM, etc.

services.title: Civil Works
services.description: Well site Developments, Excavation and Backfilling Activities, Surveying works, Site grading, Filling and Compaction Works
services.detailedDescription: Security Upgrading and fencing work for site lay down and camp, Concrete Foundation such as building works, road works and substation works, Concrete curbstone work, interlocks and concrete paving works, Road earth works and sub grade and road base laying works, Culverts and pipe bridge works, road earth works and temporary road works.
services: Sub grade and road base laying works
Residential, commercial and industrial building works
Sewer, raw waterline and other underground utilities work

services.title: Generator Works
services.description: We offer customized Preventative Maintenance (PM) programs to our customers.
services.detailedDescription: Frequently, standby generator systems remain idle for long periods. Like any other equipment, industrial generator systems need to be periodically checked and undergo routine maintenance to ensure they are fully operational when needed. A power outage is not the time to discover your standby generator system isn't operational.

services.title: Heat Exchangers
services.description: Mohammed Abdul Hamid Al-Bishri Company Services has the capabilities to custom design and manufacture high quality heat exchangers of varying capacities and designs.
services.detailedDescription: Using HTRI and Microprotol and manufacture high quality heat exchangers of varying capacities and designs using carbon steel, super duplex and titanium. Clad tube-sheets are becoming a common requirement in the oil & gas industry and many of our heat exchangers are now being delivered with Stainless Steel and Monel cladding.
capabilities: Custom design using HTRI and Microprotol
Carbon steel, super duplex and titanium materials

services.title: Trading and Material Supply
services.description: We have alliances with a diverse group of companies in Saudi Arabia and abroad, that are based on mutual understanding of building long-term stable relationships.
services.detailedDescription: With that, we are able to provide quality, low-cost services to our customers. The array of best merit products supplied by us consists of Industrial Pipes & Fittings, Valves, Flanges, Structural Steel, Gratings, Equipments and Tools, Nuts & Bolts, etc.

services.description: Mohammed Abdul Hamid Al-Bishri Company is engaged in supply of all categories of skilled, semi skilled and unskilled manpower for the clients with all degrees of disciplines without any delay.

services.title: Scaffolding Works
services.description: We are the leading scaffolding contractor with more than 5 years of experiences in scaffolding Works.
services.detailedDescription: We offer to all our clients' competitive rates together with the highest standard of work. Our work varies enormously from simple scaffolding, for a painting a private customer houses, up to the largest commercial and industrial scaffold projects.
